thread.title: Guernsey wins best UK port for 'substantial' on island development for passengers
thread.title_full: Guernsey wins best UK port for 'substantial' on island development for passengers | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Guernsey wins best UK port for 'substantial' on island development for passengers
text:
Credit: PA Image Guernsey has won the best UK port in the Cruise Critic Editor Awards.
The island has been chosen because of it's 'substantial' on island developments to cater for cruise passengers.
Its increasing popularity was also a contributing factor.
There's been a 74% increase in cruises from 2012.
Last updated Mon 5 Oct 2015 Travel Guernsey
